level.heading: Asbestos abatement - Rules and regulations.
level.text: The Mayor is authorized to issue rules and regulations, in accordance with recommendations of the Task Force, to carry out the purposes of this subchapter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 5-173
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 5-173, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 44-731.
